## Checking what happens to wercker with demanding code chunks...

```{r}
rowSums2 <- function(df) {
  out <- df[[1L]]
  if (ncol(df) == 1) return(out)

  for (i in 2:ncol(df)) {
    out <- out + df[[i]]
  }
  out
}

df <- as.data.frame(
  replicate(1e3, sample(100, 1e6, replace = TRUE))
)
system.time(rowSums(df))
```
